column4: Hmm actually this HAS to be a firewall.. if Ubuntu can see everything on the LAN/WAN but nothing on the LAN connects properly to the Ubuntu box? ...
Yep .. MUST be some firewall hiding on the Ubuntu side.. what can I do to nuke all the firewalls (sudo ufw diable  = DONE)
There's also iptables, but that's unconfigured by default AFAIK
